JobFullDesc: Application Admin – Fed IT Business IntelligenceJoin us as a Application Admin on the Fed IT Business Intelligence team in USA-Remote to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact.What you’ll achieveAs a App Admin you will be combining your software and systems engineering expertise to manage some of the most complex environments of our customers. You will be working in a newly built cloud platform to support all Dell as-a-service customers.You will have and use:Administration and configurations of Oracle/aMicrosoft BI tools, should have strong Unix/Linux / Windows knowledge to manage the environmentReporting tools - Installation, Patching, and Maintenance and Administration activities for external authenticators like AD, OUD and enable external authentication for ODI usersSystem Optimizations, Capacity Planning and Performance Tunings and Database management experience with Oracle Database 19c  and Microsoft SQL 2017 and analysis and Troubleshooting of SQL queries and provide performance improvement recommendationsCode packaging, migrations and automation of migration activity (CI/CD) for BI apps latest versions in Windows and Linux/Unix environmentsAs a federal employee, Dell expects its employees to understand and apply commonly known data assurance practices and possess a working knowledge of applicable industry controls such as NIST 800-53 and 800-171Take the first step towards your dream careerEvery Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here’s what we are looking for with this role:* MUST BE US CITIZENEssential Requirements Needs to have sound knowledge and experience on business intelligence and/or business analyticsStrong analytical and troubleshooting abilities with emphasis in solving problems independentlyMust possess ability to diagnose reported problems and identify and resolve root causeAbility to work effectively with peers, management and internal and external business partnersDesirable Requirements Bachelors degree in Computer Science or Computer Information Systems or equivalent practical experienceAt least 2 years of Devops/App Administration for Oracle/Microsoft Business Intelligence Tools as well as knowledge of Azure Dev Ops and/or Agile/Scrum MethodologyHere’s our story; now tell us yoursDell Technologies helps organizations and individuals build a brighter digital tomorrow. Our company is made up of more than 150,000 people, located in over 180 locations around the world. We’re proud to be a diverse and inclusive team and have an endless passion for our mission to drive human progress.What’s most important to us is that you are respected, feel like you can be yourself and have the opportunity to do the best work of your life -- while still having a life. We offer excellent benefits, bonus programs, flexible work arrangements, a variety of career development opportunities, employee resource groups, and much more.We started with computers, but we didn’t stop there. We are helping customers move into the future with multi-cloud, AI and machine learning through the most innovative technology and services portfolio for the data era. Join us and become a part of what’s next in technology, starting today.You can also learn more about us by reading our latest Diversity and Inclusion Report and our plan to make the world a better place by 2030 here.Dell is committed to the principle of equal employment opportunity for all employees and to providing employees with a work environment free of discrimination and harassment. All employment decisions at Dell are based on business needs, job requirements and individual qualifications, without regard to race, color, religion or belief, national, social or ethnic origin, sex (including pregnancy), age, physical, mental or sensory disability, HIV Status, sexual orientation, gender identity and/or expression, marital, civil union or domestic partnership status, past or present military service, family medical history or genetic information, family or parental status, or any other status protected by the laws or regulations in the locations where we operate. Dell will not tolerate discrimination or harassment based on any of these characteristics. Dell encourages applicants of all ages. Read the full Equal Employment Opportunity Policy here.
